---
category: news
title: "A machine learning approach to personalized dose adjustment of lamotrigine using noninvasive clinical parameters"
excerpt: "The pharmacokinetic variability of lamotrigine (LTG) plays a significant role in its dosing requirements. Our goal here was to use noninvasive clinical parameters to predict the dose-adjusted concentrations (C/D ratio) of LTG based on machine learning (ML) algorithms."
